accommodations.title: Comfort and Elegance
accommodations.subtitle: Discover our carefully designed rooms for your perfect stay

standard.name: Standard Room
standard.description: Standard rooms are internal or street-facing and feature thermo-acoustic windows (German technology), a minibar, telephone, and air conditioning, ensuring comfort and silence.

luxury.name: Luxury Suite
luxury.description: Luxury apartments are 8 m² larger than Standard rooms, face the pool, and are equipped with a minibar, telephone, and air conditioning. They have anti-allergenic flooring for greater well-being.

quadruple.name: Quadruple Suite
quadruple.description: Spacious suite with four single beds, ideal for families or groups, with all the amenities for a comfortable stay.

planning.title: Personalized Planning
planning.description: Our specialized team takes care of every detail of your event, from planning to execution, ensuring everything is perfect.

convention.title: Convention Center
convention.description: The Radio Hotel Convention Center is ideal for large events, offering 800 m², expandable to 1,200 m², and capacity for up to 350 people. With a 5-meter high ceiling, the space features the Millenium and Monterey auditoriums and 5 modular rooms. It is fully air-conditioned (288,000 BTUs Mitsubishi) and equipped with state-of-the-art technology, including IT resources, internet, multimedia, projection, and DVD, ensuring flexibility and comfort for your event.
